statements: SELECT * FROM healthcare_services;
SELECT service_name, service_type, city FROM healthcare_services ORDER BY service_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_services WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT service_id, service_name, address, zipcode FROM healthcare_services WHERE city = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT service_name, location_id, address, city, state, zipcode FROM healthcare_services ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_services WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT service_name, city, zipcode FROM healthcare_services WHERE location_id = 1001 ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT MAX(service_id) AS max_service_id, MIN(service_id) AS min_service_id FROM healthcare_services WHERE city LIKE 'S%' GROUP BY city;
SELECT DISTINCT service_type FROM healthcare_services WHERE zipcode LIKE '9%' ORDER BY service_type DESC;
SELECT service_name, address, state FROM healthcare_services WHERE service_type = 'Hospital' AND opening_hours IN ('9AM-5PM', '24/7') ORDER BY state, address DESC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_facilities;
SELECT id, name FROM healthcare_facilities WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM geographical_data ORDER BY state, city;
SELECT name, address FROM healthcare_facilities WHERE location = POINT(40.7128, -74.0060);
SELECT city, region FROM geographical_data WHERE city LIKE '%York%';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_facilities WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, address FROM healthcare_facilities WHERE location = POINT(40.7128, -74.0060);
SELECT * FROM geographical_data WHERE region = 'North';
SELECT city, state FROM geographical_data WHERE coordinates = POINT(37.7749, -122.4194);
SELECT primary_contact FROM healthcare_facilities WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT center_name, category FROM healthcare_centers WHERE category = 'Hospital';
SELECT center_name, safety_rating FROM healthcare_centers WHERE safety_rating > 4;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT center_name, accessibility_level FROM healthcare_centers WHERE accessibility_level = 'Fully Accessible' AND safety_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM accessibility_status AS a JOIN healthcare_centers AS h ON a.center_id = h.center_id JOIN locations AS l ON h.location_id = l.location_id
SELECT center_name, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM healthcare_centers JOIN locations ON healthcare_centers.location_id = locations.location_id
SELECT center_name, category, s.accessibility_level, s.safety_rating FROM healthcare_centers AS c JOIN accessibility_status AS s ON c.center_id = s.center_id

SELECT center_name, location_name, latitude, longitude, accessibility_level, safety_rating FROM healthcare_centers AS c JOIN accessibility_status AS s ON c.center_id = s.center_id JOIN locations AS l ON c.location_id = l.location_id

SELECT h.center_name, a.accessibility_level, a.safety_rating, l.location_name, l.latitude, l.longitude FROM healthcare_centers AS h JOIN accessibility_status AS a ON h.center_id = a.center_id JOIN locations AS l ON h.location_id = l.location_id
SELECT * FROM hospitals;
SELECT name, bed_capacity, location_longitude FROM hospitals;
SELECT hospital_id, name, bed_capacity FROM hospitals ORDER BY bed_capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM doctors WHERE specialization='Cardiology';
SELECT patient_id, name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE hospital_id=123;
SELECT * FROM hospitals WHERE bed_capacity > 100;
SELECT name, specialization FROM doctors ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 18 AND 30;
SELECT name, city, state, country FROM locations WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT hospital_id, name, location_longitude, location_latitude FROM hospitals ORDER BY location_longitude DESC;
SELECT * FROM hospitals ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, location, capacity FROM hospitals WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT name, specialty FROM doctors WHERE specialty = 'Pediatrician';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT location_id, name, city FROM locations WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT * FROM hospitals WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT doctor_id, name, specialty FROM doctors WHERE hospital_id IN (1, 3);
SELECT patient_id, name, gender FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND gender='Female';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location_id, name, city, state FROM locations WHERE zipcode='12345';
